snippet.title: Choice of Life: Middle Ages Release Trailer
snippet.description:
A card game in a medieval setting where you make decisions on which not only your life will depend, but also the future of the kingdom!
Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1337890/The_Choice_of_Life_Middle_Ages/
Google play link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.BlazingPlanetStudio.TheChoiceofLifeMiddleAges
